subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Inter Milan and AS Roma posted comfortable victories to extend their lead atop the Italian league. Inter beat Lazio, 3-0, with a penalty kick from Zlatan Ibrahimovic and goals from Maicon and David Suazo. The Brazilian midfielder Rodrigo Taddei scored twice as Roma beat Cagliari, 2-0.
